content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, y=5.0)
Used to convert iron ore into iron plates for downstream production.  
• Structure: Single furnace entity utilized for iron smelting.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, y=-60.0)
Used to convert copper ore into copper plates required for later crafting steps.  
• Structure: Single furnace entity utilized for copper smelting.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Consistency – When calling get_entities(), incorrect argument usage was encountered (first by using an unexpected keyword “radius” and later by passing extra positional arguments). Verify the function signature and provide only the permitted arguments.  
• Lab Placement Verification – Attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) failed due to its absence in the inventory; always confirm that the required item is available before placement.  
• Defensive Iteration – An error arose from iterating over a None value (when get_entities returned None). Use a default empty list or check for None prior to iteration to avoid such type errors.  
• Resource Chain Completeness – Lab crafting repeatedly failed because of missing sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable). Ensure that every component in the production chain is sufficiently available and that prerequisite resources are processed through the proper smelting or crafting facilities before attempting to craft complex items.
